sentences.en: 673 private golf clubs took part in a recent study.
sentences.cn: 673家私人高尔夫俱乐部参与了最近的研究。

sentences.en: Attitudes to mental illness have shifted in recent years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年对精神病的态度已有所改变。

sentences.en: Foote's most recent play, "Dividing the Estate," is an ensemble piece.
sentences.cn: 福特的最新戏剧《分房产》是个合演剧目。

sentences.en: In recent years the Austrian economy has outperformed most other industrial economies.
sentences.cn: 近几年，奥地利的经济发展超过了其他多数工业国。

sentences.en: New recruits have been undergoing training in recent weeks.
sentences.cn: 最近几周，新兵正在接受训练。

sentences.en: Recent events have made his central theme even more apposite.
sentences.cn: 新近发生的事情使得他的中心主题显得更加有的放矢。

sentences.en: recent research into the causes of cancer
sentences.cn: 近来对致癌原因的研究

sentences.en: Recent, more dramatic use of CGI was seen in "Walking With Dinosaurs".
sentences.cn: 在纪录片《与恐龙同行》中可以看到最新的、更加生动的电脑特效技术。

sentences.en: Specialists see various reasons for the recent surge in inflation.
sentences.cn: 专家们认为目前通货膨胀加剧有多种原因。

sentences.en: Superficially there have been many changes in Britain in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近几年来英国的面貌发生了很多变化。

sentences.en: The dollar's recent strength is crimping overseas sales and profits.
sentences.cn: 美元最近的坚挺影响了国外的销量和利润。

sentences.en: The more recent conifer plantations cannot yet compare with the old woodlands.
sentences.cn: 年代较近的针叶树林场还比不上年代久远的林场。

sentences.en: The recent rain had churned up the waterfall into a muddy whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 最近的一场雨把瀑布搅成了泥水漩涡。

sentences.en: The recent spurt in violence has demoralised the public.
sentences.cn: 最近暴力行为激增，这已经打击了公众的信心。

sentences.en: There are two among their recent introductions that have greatly impressed me.
sentences.cn: 在他们最近引进的东西里面有两样给我留下了非常深刻的印象。

sentences.en: This site remained undiscovered, though long sought, until recent times.
sentences.cn: 虽经长期寻找，但该遗址直到最近才被发现。

trans.tran_en: having happened or started only a short time ago
